about_the_game:
Spartacus Blood Arena is an intense gladiator-themed combat game, developed by indie studio Survival Player in partnership with the archaeology departments and reenactors of Rome, Capua, and Pompeii. Step into the brutal world of ancient arenas where every fight is a battle for survival. Featuring historically inspired arenas and characters, this game brings to life the raw and unforgiving nature of gladiatorial combat. Customize your gladiator, master different fighting styles, and rise to glory in thrilling, visceral battles. Will you conquer the arena and earn your freedom, or fall to the sands of history?

Key Features:

- Authentic gladiator combat inspired by historical research.

- Stunning arenas based on real locations in Rome, Capua, and Pompeii.

- Deep customization options for your gladiator’s weapons and armor.

- Single-player campaign and multiplayer modes for epic battles.

- Real-time combat system with brutal and dynamic fight mechanics.

content_descriptors.notes: Historical violent content, non-explicit sex (only allusions) related to the story of Spartacus
